channel.title: Oh shit! A S.T.A.L.K.E.R. TV Show!
channel.description:
[url='https://www.kinostalker.com/?lang=en']https://www.kinostalker.com/?lang=en[/url]
I just saw this today, and was wondering on all of your opinions. Good or bad for the series? Quality of dubbing and trailer?

item.title: Oh shit! A S.T.A.L.K.E.R. TV Show!
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
This has a lot of potential and I’m really looking forward to it. I just it has good production values so they can really bring the zone to life.

item.title: Oh shit! A S.T.A.L.K.E.R. TV Show!
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
DenDrio:

This, dubs ruin everything. Also this looks amazing and I hope that it’ll air on American TV, otherwise, I’d be one saaaad DenDrio.

I find that dubs for animated series work rather well but trying to do it for a live action movie never works.

item.title: Oh shit! A S.T.A.L.K.E.R. TV Show!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Today is one of those days I’m happy I know russian.

Although the last russian action tv show I watched was from the early 2000s, and really, really sucked, so I haven’t watched anything since. lets hope their TV quality has improved since then
